## Funding Goals

Set these goals on your GitHub Sponsors dashboard to show progress:

### Goal 1: $10/month
**Title:** "Buy Me a Coffee â˜•"
**Description:** First milestone! This covers my weekly coffee while coding new features. Every little bit helps keep this project caffeinated and growing!

### Goal 2: $50/month
**Title:** "Part-Time Development"
**Description:** Dedicate regular time to new features, bug fixes, and community support. This allows me to work on apolisher-chrome consistently each week!

### Goal 3: $100/month
**Title:** "Full Feature Roadmap"
**Description:** Unlock major features like:
- Multi-language AI models (Claude, Gemini, etc.)
- Advanced diff view modes
- Keyboard shortcuts
- Team/workspace features
